content: this spooky mosaic crochet motif is my contribution to the free halloween mosaic blanket cal 1 hosted by remington lane crochet worked in overlay mosaic crochet it s perfect for adding a playful haunting touch to your blanket this halloween season if you opt to purchase this individual design outside of the cal you will receive ️ written and graphical instructions ️ single-sided and reversible instructions ️ us and uk crochet terms ️ large print option ✨ about the cal the halloween mosaic blanket cal features 13 unique sections each designed by a different crochet designer two sections are released each week between september 8 and october 23 2025 you can follow along for free graph only or grab the full ebook graphs + written instructions to stitch at your own pace whether you join the cal community or just make this ghostly design on its own you ll end up with a cosy and festive piece that s perfect for spooky season you may sell the blankets that you crochet by following this pattern on a small scale provided that you credit elimee designs as the pattern designer mass production is not permitted this pattern or any of its parts may not be altered reproduced distributed sold made into a video tutorial or translated without written permission from elimee designs copies can be made for personal use only please note that all pdf crochet patterns by elimee designs are non-refundable this pattern is only available in english if you would like any support whilst crocheting this pattern or to give us any feedback please contact me here or post in the elimee designs crochet pattern group on facebook 2 sign-up to receive my weekly newsletter 3 where you ll receive freebies hear about giveaways/sales and be the first to know about new pattern launches for all safety notices and gpsr contact details please visit the blog post linked below this pdf if free from viruses malware and a risk assessment has been carried out 1 https //elimeedesigns--remingtonlane thrivecart com/halloween-mosaic-blanket/68abdebac7127/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/575696026789853 3 https //dashboard mailerlite
